title.narrative: Power of Pride Asia

description.narrative: 1. Individual LGBTI know and accept their SOGIESC and can ensure their rights in society are respected. They can meaningfully engage with societal structures. 2 A support system for LGBTI is developed based on discussions about common issues, needs and challenges, creating the motivation to act against discrimination and marginalisation. 3 LGBTI CBOs can strategically engage in societal and political decision-making processes using evidence-based advocacy. 4 Agile LGBTI movements are built that can work collectively to create social and political change and respond flexibly to various situations. 5 Institutions and other allies have an internal drive to include LGBTI in their decision-making and other structures. LGBTI are actively engaged in processes and all policy-making spaces. 6 Strong and reliable laws and policies are in place for LGBTI and are enforced by all relevant bodies. Follow-up on these policies and their implementation are under scrutiny
Working towards diverse and inclusive societies in which LGBTI are able to participate to their full potential
Regional cost for Q1 2021
Regional cost for Q1 2022
Regional cost for Q2 2021
Regional cost for Q3 2021
Regional cost for Q4 2021

title.narrative: Creating LGBTI Communities

description.narrative: A support system for LGBTI has been developed based on discussions about common issues, needs and challenges, creating the motivation to act against discrimination and marginalisation

title.narrative: Number of emergency cases supported.

description.narrative: This indicator accounts for the emergency cases supported

title.narrative: Access and Escalation in leading up to influencing laws and policies.

description.narrative: Access to regional/national/global policy spaces is created to influence policy and facilitate escalation.

title.narrative: Number of actions undertaken to positively influence civic space in the direction of less restrictive operational space, ability to perform functions and receive funding

description.narrative: This indicator accounts for the different actions grassroots organisations, CBOs and CSOs take to engage with governments, local authorities and other power holders to improve the civic space within which they operate. This includes actions such as attempts at NGO registeration, campaigning against restrictive policies, government monitoring etc.

title.narrative: Number of embassies, diplomatic missions, EU delegations etc. who have been engaged in providing diplomatic support during emergencies.

description.narrative: This indicator accounts for the embassies diplomatic missions, EU delegations etc. that have been engaged in providing diplomatic support during emergencies

title.narrative: Number of embassies, diplomatic missions, EU delegations etc. that have been trained, sensitised and/or provided with consultations on LGBTI issues.

description.narrative: This indicator accounts for the embassies diplomatic missions, EU delegations etc. that have been trained, sensitised and/or provided with consultations on LGBTI issues.

title.narrative: Number of statements, shadow reports and other reports (Yogyakarta, UN Special Procedures) on SOGIESC and LGBTI issues that have been drafted, signed, supported and/or provided consultation to by activists and CSOs.

description.narrative: This indicator measures all the statements, shadow reports, etc. that were drafted on SOGIESC and LGBTI issues (such as renewal of International Expert on SOGIESC's mandate).

title.narrative: Number of statements, shadow reports and other reports (Yogyakarta, UN Special Procedures) around broader human rights and gender-inclusive development that have been drafted, signed, supported and/or provided consultation to by activists and CSOs.

description.narrative: This indicator measures all the statements, shadow reports, etc. that were drafted on broader human rights and gender-inclusive development (such as SRHR of womxn and girls)

title.narrative: Number of recommendations, concluding observations and resolutions made at regional and international forums with references to SOGIESC issues, LGBTI people and/or inclusive language.

description.narrative: This indicator tracks recommendations, concluding observations and resolutions made at regional and international forums with references to SOGIESC issues, LGBTI people and/or inclusive language.

title.narrative: Growing LGBTI Movements

description.narrative: Agile LGBTI movements work collectively to create social and political change and to respond flexibly to various situations.

title.narrative: Number of Partnership and alliances working on collectively formulated strategies.

description.narrative: This indicator accounts for the different grassroots organisations, CBOs and CSOs working together within the movement, but also across the movement..

title.narrative: Strengthening LGBTI CBOs

description.narrative: CBOs have a mandate with clear accountability and transparency mechanisms and can legitimately represent their community.

title.narrative: Number of grassroots organisations, CBOs and CSOs increasing their financial sustainability. (Capacities developed on proposal writing, alternative sources of funding developed)

description.narrative: This indicator accounts for the grassroots organisations, CBOs and CSOs with increased financial sustainability: Capacities developed on proposal writing, alternative sources of funding developed.

title.narrative: Number of grassroots organisations, CBOs and CSOs engaging in sustainable and representative forms of L&A. (This includes building evidence bases, undertaking research projects, developing capacities on L&A strategies, needs assesments etc.)

description.narrative: This indicator account for the grassroots organisations, CBOs and CSOs engaged in sustainable and representative forms of L&A, including building evidence bases, undertaking research projects, developing capacities on L&A strategies, needs assesments etc.

title.narrative: Number of grassroots organisations, CBOs and CSOs with increased organisational skills. (This includes capacities developed on leadership, organisational management, administration, planning processes, organisational codes of conduct etc.)

description.narrative: This indicator accounts for the grassroots organisations, CBOs and CSOs with increased organisational skills (This includes capacities developed on leadership, organisational management, administration, planning processes, organisational codes of conduct etc.)

title.narrative: Adoption and Implementation of inclusive laws and policies.

description.narrative: Decision makers are lobbied to adopt and implement laws and policies and reminded of their accountability for the implementation and enforcement of agreements.

title.narrative: Number of recommendations, concluding observations and resolutions with references to SOGIESC issues, LGBTI and/or inclusive language accepted by states.

description.narrative: This indicator counts the number of recommendations, concluding observations and resolutions that have been formally accepted by governments at adoption meetings and that those governments can be held accountable to.

title.narrative: Number of policies, laws and resolutions harmful to the LGBTI community and/or inclusive language that have been successfully blocked.

description.narrative: This indicator measures the number of policies/laws/resolutions that have been blocked in countries (through civil-society pressure) or through voting against resolutions at international forums.

title.narrative: Number of laws, policies and norms that have been implemented, improved or adopted for diverse and inclusive societies.

description.narrative: This indicator tracks the inclusive laws, policies and norms in favour of SOGIESC issues and LGBTI people that have been implemented, passed or adopted by states.

title.narrative: Awareness and Acceptance raising in LGBTI individuals.

description.narrative: Individual LGBTI break out of their isolation through information sharing and sensitisation.

title.narrative: Number of actions undertaken to raise awareness and acceptance within LGBTI communities.

description.narrative: This indicatior measures actions undertaken by grassroots organisations, CBOs and CSOs to reach out to LGBTI individuals and communities for the following purposes: provision of information on SOGIESC, human rights of LGBTI people, legal rights within national and regional frameworks, building self-esteem and integrating acceptance within LGBTI individuals and communities and enabling LGBTI individuals to engage with societal structures meaningfully.

title.narrative: Resource Development in leading up to influencing laws and policies.

description.narrative: The necessary (strategic, human and financial) resources are developed to influence policies at different levels.

title.narrative: Number of capacity building initiatives undertaken

description.narrative: Capacity building inniciatives includes: L&A skills trainings (first and second tier) provided on international and regional mechanisms, workshops, panels and side-events organised/participated, L&A engagement coaching sessions provided to LGBTI activists for international and regional mechanisms and the technical advocacy support that was provided to CSOs, CBOs or activists by the PoP Alliance.
